name: Franz: Scary Interactive Story
about:
Dive into an interactive story game in the mystery horror genre with Franz ‚Äî the enigmatic creature in your phone.

Imagine that your device is haunted by a mysterious creature named Franz, who has her own will, character and desires. Through face-to-face communication with Franz, visual novel gameplay and phone notifications, you can find out who she really is and what she truly desires. Moral choices form the narrative foundation of the story. The decisions that you make as this interactive story game progresses determine whether you become the rightful owner of Franz or turn into her puppet.

The gameplay of Franz is based on a text-rich story and tactile interaction with the character. Your smartphone is Franz herself, so you need to be much more careful with the device. Franz is unpredictable and touchy, but is very much into you. She is susceptible to physical interaction, just like any real person. Therefore, it is necessary to consider the consequences of your choices when communicating with her, even those that may seem insignificant.

This visual novel is based on physical interaction with a smartphone, namely:


One of the main ways of interacting with Franz is by solving various puzzles that illustrate the complexity of communication between people. Like in real dialogue, you can misunderstand something or miss an important detail, which can affect future interactions. Words in this text-rich story game, like in real life, are an important tool of communication, and should be handled with care.


You can express your attitude towards Franz through tactile contact, using gentle or aggressive touches. Franz can both ask for your affection and try to provoke you. It is up to you whether to submit to Franz or resist her manipulations as you go through the scary visual novel.


Franz can kick you out of the app and lock you out of it for a certain period of time. You can choose whether to wait until Franz lets you back into the game or be the one who makes the choices of your own. For example, you may attempt to interrupt the waiting time, but it can hurt Franz in the process.


Franz can send notifications when she wants you back in the game. Depending on how quickly you open the app after receiving the notification, Franz will either be offended or delighted.


Franz is a living entity that reacts differently to every action of yours, whether it's touching her, solving puzzles, ignoring her desires, or indulging her emotional manipulations. Therefore, depending on your behavior and choices, this scary interactive story will change.

Plunge into the scary interactive story game about a choice between tenderness and severity. Discover this visual novel and horror simulation game. Become Franz‚Äôs friend or reject her feelings.

name: Invincible: Guarding the Globe
about:
Invincible: Guarding the Globe is an idle squad RPG set in the Invincible universe featuring a new story never seen in the Invincible comics or Amazon Prime TV series, with graphic multi battle action, character collection, team management, idle features and, of course, super-powered visuals.

THE WORLD OF INVINCIBLE
Accompany the highly rated Invincible Amazon animation with the first Invincible mobile idle action RPG.
Embark on a complete campaign with an original story ‚Äì a new narrative with familiar characters where you join the Global Defense Agency to unravel the mystery of deadly clone army (and‚Ä¶ stolen burger meat?) working alongside the head of the GDA, Cecil Stedman.


Recruit a team of iconic characters from the Invincible comics and show. From obvious all-time favorites like Invincible and Atom Eve, to the notorious Flaxans, Mauler Twins and more.
Gain battle experience to level up your characters, combining clones to increase their rank and achieve new heights of strength, power, and overall badassery.


Assemble your team and deploy them into blood-soaked action RPG battle.
Each squad member has a role: Attacker, Defender, or Support.
It‚Äôs up to you to choose the best combo for each encounter. During combat, each member of your team can unleash their own powerful ultimate ability to smash and/or rip the enemy to a pulp and/or shreds and claim victory.


Run idle battles in the background while you‚Äôre AFK living your everyday life. Even better, accumulate tons of rewards to collect when you‚Äôre back!
Get more out of your team, send them on GDA Ops: secondary battle that runs separate from the main storyline, played simultaneously.


Team up with friends to deploy a group of heroes co-op. Prepare for social battle together, facing waves of Magmanites, Reanimen and Flaxans popping up, dropping down, or portal-ing themselves in from other dimensions.


Always good to have a little extra padding! Send your team into battle fully equipped with four categories of gear: chestwear, legwear, footwear and gloves.
Add special, unique gear known as artifacts for extra stat bonuses or passive effects.
Each piece of gear has a rarity level and can be upgraded to enhance its benefit even further.


There‚Äôs a mall‚Äôs-worth of different stores to check out. Recruit heroes, acquire gear, currencies and more! Pop into Cecil‚Äôs Recruitment Department or D.A. Sinclair‚Äôs Lab to get new idle heroes. Or visit Art‚Äôs Tailor Shop to purchase equipment and other items of interest.
Get what you want in transparent shops without frustrating gacha mechanics or lootbox systems.


More action to keep you on your toes - complete daily and weekly goals for huge in-game rewards, with frequent special offers, unique in-game events, and more to come. Each season a new character from the Invincible universe will be revealed and available to recruit for your team.

Visit us on: www.ubisoft.com/invincible

Like on Facebook: www.facebook.com/InvincibleGtG
Follow on Twitter: @InvincibleGtG
Join us on Instagram: @InvincibleGtG
Need support? Contact us here: https://support.ubi.com
Privacy Policy: https://legal.ubi.com/privacypolicy/
Terms of Use: https://legal.ubi.com/termsofuse/

name: Dragon Rider Idle
about:
The story of a hero, who teams up with dragons to save a corrupt world from the Dark Lord's grip
Begin your adventure with dragons and experience endless possibilities!

Features
- The story of a hero, who teams up with dragons to save a corrupt world from the Dark Lord's grip
Begin your adventure with dragons and experience endless possibilities!
- World Boss Dungeon - With random buffs for more strategic play
- Character appearance changes as you progress
- Equipment, companions, Infinity Stones, Relics, Runes... Various features to help you level up
- Stunning dragon skills for a thrilling adventure
- Loads of different dungeons and epic boss battles
- Receive bountiful rewards by hatching dragon eggs
- Compete with other players for your place on the World Boss Rankings
- Buffs that provide a wide range of benefits

name: How to Get Espers
about:
"A chase after we first meet and a huge brawl in the middle of our date....."
"Get to the point."
"Someone asked me to teach them with my body."
"‚Ä¶Can you explain the middle part a little?"

Even though Murphy can even see things that move at the speed of light, they look like an ordinary person so they can't even use their powers. Murphy gets caught up in some strange events and meets some even stranger espers....

How can I get it?

‚Ä¶

What.... is "it" that they'll get?

üìñSuperpower action visual novel, a story game
's main theme is "seeing" so we maximized the visual aspects of the game, which gives you an action-packed experience that the text-based games genre has never seen before. The main character struggles between their desires and limitations and grows by learning from and building relationships with diverse people. Dive into Buff Studio's new superpower action visual novel story game now!

üéÆAbout the game
- A graphic novel style visual novel game
- Easy to play - just choose from one of the options
- Play based on a familiar chat-style UI
- Dynamic production offers an even more immersive and action-packed experience
- Produced to maximizes the theme of "seeing"
- The player's choices determine the story and ending
- Find out more about the supporting characters through the side stories

üëçHow to Get Espers is for you!
- If you liked "7 Days", "Underworld Office", "Charlie in Underworld", "Not Exactly a Hero", you'll love "How to Get Espers!"
- For players who love story games, indie games, and easy games
- For players who love text-based games like light novels or visual novels
- Recommended for players who love visual novels games, adventure games, and chat-based games
- Recommended for players who love fantasy stories or light novels
- Recommended for players who love free games, indie games, and relaxing games
- Recommended for players who love light novels, mysteries, novel games, and chatting games
- Top game for players who are tired of the average story game
- Recommended for players who love unique indie games like Undertale

name: Valkyrious
about:
Endless real-time strategy and exciting tension in Valkyrious!

[About Valkyrious]
Valkyrious, a Real-time Strategy Card Game where you create decks of Valkyries with various abilities to battle opponents.
Summon Valkyries to battle and utilize tiles and synergy between Valkyries to claim victory!

‚óà Game Features ‚óà

‚ñ† Every moment is crucial!
Every second matters in this attack and defense battle of the Valkyries! Claim victory over the battlefield by coming up with a quick strategy at the crucial moment.
Never let your guard down on the battlefield!

‚ñ† Claim victory with various types of Valkyries!
Each Valkyrie has their own unique set of skills.
Collect various Valkyries and build your own deck.

‚ñ† Upgrade Valkyries and create your own strategy!
Even the same type of Valkyrie can be upgraded into Valkyries with different abilities.
Catch your enemies off guard with unique Valkyries.

‚ñ† Experience various combat modes!
In Chapters, you can explore the combat system and story of Valkyrious.
In the Arena, you can challenge opponents from around the world.
Hone your skills in Chapters and compete against different opponents live in the Arena.

‚ñ† Who is the top player? Participate in the Tournament!
Aim for the title of top player in the Grand Tournament, where 4 to 64 players can participate.

‚ñ† Official Channels
Check out the latest development news and various events through our official channels.
- Brand Website: http://www.valkyrious.net/
- Official Medium: https://medium.com/@valkyrious_cm
- Official Discord Server: https://discord.gg/valkyrious
- Privacy Policy: https://docs.lightcon.net/policy/valkyrious_en.html#tab3
- Recommended Specs: Android 10 or above, Galaxy S20 or above
